mapper.select: select * from gallery_file where no=#{bno} order by file_no asc
select count(*) from gallery_file where no=#{bno} and ( file_name like '%.jpg%' or file_name like '%.gif%' or file_name like '%.png%' or file_name like '%.jpeg%' )
